attributes.action: Prevent Government from stopping the democratic right to vote.
attributes.additional_details: Currently our local May elections have been postponed for 2 years and this is now to be extended for 3 more years.
attributes.background: Pass a law that establishes the requirement for Government to abide by the democratic right to hold ALL scheduled elections for all levels.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Remove power to cancel local government elections" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747234
